Header: A POLICY BASED ON SECURITY AND SOVEREIGNTY - GOTABHAYA
Content: Former Defense Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa, the Presidential candidate of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna led by the joint opposition stated that his policies have been formulated based on national security, sovereignty, discipline and the environment. He shared these thoughts at the special convention of the Pivithuru Hela Urumaya held yesterday at the Buddhadasa Stadium in Pelawatta.
